content:
It sounds like you had a great conversation with Sophia. Here's an updated template:

| Name | How We Met | Interests | Follow-up Action |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Sophia | Coffee Shop (City) | Indie music, coffee | Send her a list of new indie music releases |

You could follow up with Sophia by sending her a list of new indie music releases or recommendations, or even invite her to a concert or music event. You could also ask her if she's tried out any of the coffee spots you recommended and get her feedback.

Remember to keep your follow-up action specific and actionable, so you can easily follow through and stay top of mind with Sophia.
